messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] 2nd attemp
messages.msgSnippet: Hello Andres, my name is Zoltán Géczi. Unfortunatelly I don t have any significant information on this question. If I could help you, I would - I used to
messages.messageBody:
Hello Andres,

my name is Zoltán Géczi. Unfortunatelly I don't have any significant
information on this question. If I could help you, I would - I used to paint
figures for long years, and I know those figure which you are busy with.
Great stuff, so do it nice. Please, let me tell you something, just an
advise: do not overdo the figure, keep it simple and elegant. Most painters
like to overcolor the samurai figures.
All the best,

GZ

PS.: Did anyone see the movie Saulabi? The story plays cca. 1050, and all
the japanese warriors fight with "standard" katana swords. I really don't
know if it is okay or not: katana became a general weapon of the samurais
only in the Kamamura-period, I assume. Any opinion on this? I guess they had
to fight with tachis.

----------------------------------------------------------

"Change of speed, a change of style
A change of scene, with no regrets"

Ian Curtis: New Dawn Fades

-------------------------------------------------------
----- Original Message -----
From: "moraand" <Moraand@...>
To: <samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, October 28, 2002 1:10 PM
Subject: [samuraihistory] 2nd attemp


> Hi, my name is Andres Mora from Caracas, Venezuela,
> (moraand@c...) I feel so glad to be a member of this forum, I
> need your help, I am a figure painter, In this moment I paint a Late
> Heian Period Samurai, 90mm scale (pegaso model), I wanna paint a
> scene in the front of yoroi, somebody send me a historic ilustration
> or a paint from this period to paint this, the emsambly instructions
> ilustrations have some flowers and dragons motivs in a rombo
> structure I think that a paint or ilustrations will be great.Thanks
> PD excuse my english
> Andres

messages.messageBody:
Hi, my name is Andres Mora from Caracas, Venezuela,
(moraand@c...) I feel so glad to be a member of this forum, I
need your help, I am a figure painter, In this moment I paint a Late
Heian Period Samurai, 90mm scale (pegaso model), I wanna paint a
scene in the front of yoroi, somebody send me a historic ilustration
or a paint from this period to paint this, the emsambly instructions
ilustrations have some flowers and dragons motivs in a rombo
structure I think that a paint or ilustrations will be great.Thanks
PD excuse my english
Andres
